name: Word Chain (Theumske)
description: This is a fun family game or signleplayer game where you have to type words at the time and the next word has to start with the same word as the last letter of the word before and cant be the same word as any of the last words. You can set your own rules and just have fun. I made this game because we played it in the car but when we played it for a while we always forgot what words we have said and havent. You can type random words but you can set rules like, Only animals and objects or only names. You can choose how or with who you play
